sentences.sContent: He went outside to chop some more wood for the fire.
sentences.sCn: 他出去再砍些木材来生火。

sentences.sContent: Can you chop up some carrots for me?
sentences.sCn: 你能帮我切一些胡萝卜吗？

sentences.sContent: Add two finely chopped onions and a clove of garlic.
sentences.sCn: 加上两个切碎的洋葱和一瓣大蒜。

remMethod.val: 到商店(shop)买排骨(chop)； 参考： chopsticks(n. 筷子)

words.tran: [电子] 斩波器；斧头；切碎机

trans.tranOther: to cut something into smaller pieces
a small piece of meat on a bone, usually cut from a sheep or pig
